name: simplyimport
description: SASS/PHP-like imports with an @import directive supporting conditional imports
author: danielkalen

scripts.compile: coffee -o ./ -c src/simplyimport.coffee && npm run prependbin && npm run makeexec && copytopublic
scripts.prependbin: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - simplyimport.js > tmp.js && mv tmp.js simplyimport.js
scripts.test: npm run test:standard && npm run test:coffee && npm run test:coffee-tab && npm run test:both && npm run test:conditions && npm run test:conditions-preserve && npm run test:uglify
